description: A tool to print DICOM file information to stdout.

hex.title: Hexadecimal printout flag
hex.description: Include hexadecimal printout for integer values.

noname.title: No element names flag
noname.description: Don't include element names in the printout.

sexinfo.title: Siemens EXtra INFO flag
sexinfo.description: Dump Siemens EXtra INFO text (0029 1020), if present (can be VERY lengthy).

mulfram.title: Multi-frame information flag
mulfram.description: Dump multi-frame information, if present (1 line per frame, plus an XML-style header/footer). This option also implies -noname.

v_dump.title: Binary data dump count
v_dump.description: Dump n words of binary data also.

slice_times.title: Slice times flag
slice_times.description: Show slice times from Siemens mosaic images.

slice_times_verb.title: Verbose slice times flag
slice_times_verb.description: Show slice times from Siemens mosaic images verbosely. (multiple uses increase verbosity, can dump CSA data)
